title: Backend and Systems Software Developer
description:
We’re looking for a hardcore backend and systems software developer to tackle one of our largest (and most challenging/rewarding) client projects.

You’ll join a small team of talented developers working in a Scrum/Agile fashion. You'll work to design and implement creative solutions to difficult problems. Once this project is completed, you’ll transition to other client work that is equally demanding of your skill set.
lookingFor:
Your toolkit should include:

  • 3+ years of professional development experience
  • Advanced knowledge of a backend system like Ruby on Rails
  • Experience with and a love of systems programming (C/C++)
  • Heavy experience with TDD
  • Experience with Linux based systems

Bonus tools in your kit:

  • Experience with image processing
  • Deep understanding of ImageMagick
  • Knowledge of Go
  • Experience with Agile development methodologies
